org.itemscript.core
Interface JsonSystem

All Superinterfaces:
HasSystem, JsonCreator, JsonGetAccess, JsonPutAccess
All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemscriptSystem
public interface JsonSystem
extends JsonGetAccess, JsonPutAccess, HasSystem, JsonCreator

A JsonSystem provides access to facilities for parsing, storing, and manipulating JSON values.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

Method Detail

copy

PutResponse copy(JsonValue value,
                 java.lang.String toUrl)
Copy a value into the system. The original value may come from a different JsonSystem. The value will be converted to a JSON string and then re-parsed, so JsonNative values will not be preserved and JsonString values with a binary value will be converted to base-64 encoded strings.

Parameters:
value - The value to copy.
toUrl - The URL to copy to.
Returns:
The PutResponse generated by the put operation.

copy

PutResponse copy(java.lang.String fromUrl,
                 java.lang.String toUrl)
Copy a value from one URL to another.

Parameters:
fromUrl - The URL to copy from.
toUrl - The URL to copy to.
Returns:
The PutResponse generated by the put operation.

copy

void copy(java.lang.String fromUrl,
          java.lang.String toUrl,
          PutCallback callback)
Copy a value from one URL to another, asychronously.

Parameters:
fromUrl - The URL to copy from.
toUrl - The URL to copy to.
callback - The callback to call when the operation is complete.

get

JsonValue get(java.lang.String url)
Get a value from the given URL.

If the URL is relative, it will be interpreted as relative to the URL "mem:/".

Parameters:
url - The URL to get the value from.
Returns:
The value returned from the URL.

get

void get(java.lang.String url,
         GetCallback callback)
Get a value from the given URL, asynchronously.

If the URL is relative, it will be interpreted as relative to the URL "mem:/".

Calls the given callback when the value has been retrieved.

Parameters:
url - The URL to get the value from.
callback - Called when the value is returned.

parse

JsonValue parse(java.lang.String json)
Parse the contents of the given string as JSON.

Specified by:
parse in interface JsonCreator
Parameters:
json - The string containing JSON to be parsed.
Returns:
The JsonValue corresponding to the string.

parseReader

JsonValue parseReader(java.lang.Object reader)
Parse the contents of the given Reader as JSON.

The argument is specified as Object only because GWT does not contain Reader.

Note: this method is inoperative in the GWT environment.

Specified by:
parseReader in interface JsonCreator
Parameters:
reader - The Reader to parse.
Returns:
The JsonValue corresponding to the contents of the Reader.

put

PutResponse put(java.lang.String url,
                JsonValue value)
Put a value at the given URL.

Parameters:
url - The URL where the value is to be put.
value - The value to put.
Returns:
The PutResponse returned by the put operation.

put

void put(java.lang.String url,
         JsonValue value,
         PutCallback callback)
Put a value at the given URL, calling the given callback when the operation is complete.

Parameters:
url - The URL where the value is to be put.
value - The value to put.
callback - Called when the put operation is complete.

remove

RemoveResponse remove(java.lang.String url)
Remove the value at the given URL.

Parameters:
url - The URL of the value to remove.
Returns:
The RemoveResponse returned by the remove operation.

remove

void remove(java.lang.String url,
            RemoveCallback callback)
Remove the value at the given URL, calling the given callback when the operation is complete.

Parameters:
url - The URL of the value to remove.
callback - Called when the remove operation has completed.

util

JsonUtil util()
Get the JsonUtil object for this system. The JsonUtil object contains various implementation methods that may be useful but aren't really part of the core system interface.

Returns:
The associated JsonUtil.

setConstant

void setConstant(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String value)
Set a constant in this JsonSystem.

Parameters:
name - The name of the constant.
value - The value of the constant.
Throws:
ItemscriptError - If a constant with this name has already been set.

constant

java.lang.String constant(java.lang.String name)
Get a constant from this JsonSystem.

Parameters:
name - The name of the constant.
Returns:
The value of the constant.
Throws:
ItemscriptError - If a constant with this name has not been set.
